Package us.teaminceptus.silverskillz.api

Interface SilverConfig

public interface SilverConfig
Represents the SilverSkillz Configuration

    • getMessage

      @NotNull static @NotNull String getMessage(String key)
      Fetches a Message from the current language.

      This method is used for messages because it places plugin.prefix before fetching the key.

      Parameters:
      key - Key to fetch
      Returns:
      found message, or "Unknown Value" if not found
